settings.bundle_discount_text: Get a [discount]% discount buying these products together

settings.brand_title: Open up the path to victory in the most prestigious esports tournament

settings.brand_des: Blacklyte is an innovative global brand that embodies a creative lifestyle. Our journey began with a vision to revolutionize entertainment experiences by creating immersive solutions driven by technology.

settings.heading: Unmatched Value, Elite Comfort
settings.text: Experience top-tier comfort without breaking the bank , designed to rival industry leaders. Crafted with high-quality materials and engineering precision, it offers the essential ergonomic support needed for intense gaming sessions. Enjoy the same high-standard design trusted by gamers & workers globally, now available at an incredibly affordable price. Dive into your games & work with peace of mind and comfort that lasts.

settings.title: Steel frame
settings.description: Integrated Keel Steel Frame Durable and Sturdy

settings.heading: Ergonomic Lumbar Support
settings.text: This lumbar support is crafted with an ergonomic curve to perfectly match the natural shape of your lower back. The soft cushioning helps alleviate pressure from extended sitting sessions, and the seamless design ensures a snug, comfortable fit.

settings.heading: Magnetic Memory Foam Head Pillow
settings.text: Easy adjustments. The magnetic Head Pillow offers plush support that molds comfortably to your neck, providing excellent cushioning and relaxation. The magnetic design allows for effortless removal in seconds, making cleaning and maintenance a breeze.

settings.heading: Soft Touch, Superior Durability
settings.text: Our new-generation premium leatherette is 10x more durable than regular PU leather, so you know it’s primed for years of daily use.Our cushion features a high-density foam that offers better support and remarkable comfort. Designed to maintain its shape, it ensures a consistent level of comfort, making it perfect for extended gaming sessions.

settings.heading: Adjustable 4D Armrests
settings.text: Elevate your experience with 4D armrests, adjustable for any scenario. Move them 1.77 inches forward or backward, 0.31 inches side to side, raise up to 2.95 inches, and rotate 15° for optimal comfort and enduring gameplay without fatigue.

settings.heading: How do I track my order?
settings.content: Once your order ships, you'll receive a shipping confirmation email and tracking number, so you can follow your package as it makes its way to you. However, tracking information can take up to 24 hours to update, so don’t worry if it doesn't show up immediately. We recommend tracking your order and ensuring that you’re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: When Will My Order be Shipped?
settings.content: Inventory orders are typically shipped the next business day and will be delivered within 1-5 business days.  For more information, please check our Shipping and Return Policy.

settings.heading: My order has been shipped. Can I change or cancel my order?
settings.content: Unfortunately, we’re unable to cancel your order once it ships.

settings.heading: Can I exchange my Order？
settings.content: For the most efficient resolution to obtain the item you desire, we recommend returning the original item. Once your return is approved, we encourage you to proceed with a separate purchase for the new item.  For more information, please check our Return & Refund Policy.

settings.heading: How will my order be delivered?
settings.content: We deliver your order straight to your address via FedEx. You’ll receive an email with a tracking number when your order ships, so you can easily track your order. Please ensure that you’re home on the day of delivery to receive your order.

settings.heading: What do I do if I face an issue with my purchase?
settings.content: In the unlikely event that you come across any damaged, defective or missing parts, please contact us at support@blacklyte.com with a photo of the affected area and your order number. Our support specialists will do their best to assist you.
